mapper.select:
select
from analysis_all_year where year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} UNION select 0 as role_id, 0 as type, IFNULL(sum(onwork),0) as onwork, IFNULL(sum(overtime),0) as overtime, IFNULL(SUM(partial_done),0) as partial_done, IFNULL(SUM(done),0) as done, IFNULL(SUM(stop),0) as `stop`, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} as `year`, 0 as `month` from analysis_all_year where year < #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from from analysis_year_role where year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} and type = 1

select
from from analysis_year_role where year = #{year} and month = #{month} and type = 1
select distinct date_format(create_time, '%Y') AS YEAR from msg
select distinct date_format(create_time, '%m') AS MONTH from msg where date_format(create_time, '%Y') = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}
